name: Emby
short_description: Media server with theater mode, live TV, and mobile sync features.
description: Emby is a media server that organizes your video, music, and photo collections and streams them to devices. Similar to Plex, it offers a premium experience with features like theater mode for big screens, live TV with DVR capabilities, hardware transcoding, mobile sync for offline viewing, and a comprehensive guide. Emby offers both a free and paid (Emby Premiere) version - the Docker image includes all features but some require a paid subscription. It's a solid alternative to Jellyfin with a more polished interface but less customization.
usecases: Stream your movie and TV collection to any device.
Watch live TV with DVR functionality (requires tuner).
Sync media to mobile devices for offline viewing.
Use theater mode for an immersive viewing experience.
notes: Some features require Emby Premiere subscription
Hardware transcoding available with proper GPU setup
Similar to Jellyfin/Plex but with different feature set
